welcome: Welcome to ROCK, PAPER, SCISSORS, LIZARD & SPOCK!
instructions:
INSTRUCTIONS: To play this game, you will use the following keys:
(r) for ROCK,
(p) for PAPER,
(s) for SCISSORS,
(l) for LIZARD
(k) for SPOCK.

...The first to reach 5 is the GRAND WINNER!


=> PRESS ENTER to BEGIN
invalidEnterKey: Invalid key! Please PRESS ENTER to begin.
playerChoice: ROCK >>> PAPER >>> SCISSORS >>> LIZARD...Choose NOW!(r, p, s, l, k):
invalidChoice: That's not a valid choice. Please ENTER r, p, s, l or k:
playerWon: YOU ARE the GRAND WINNER! CONGRATULATIONS!
computerWon: I AM the GRAND WINNER! Better Luck Next Time.
anotherRound: ENTER (Y) to play again, or any other key to exit.
goodbye: Thank you for playing with me...GOODBYE!
